column4: hi there - I have an old laptop with P3, 256 ram etc any chance I could install gusty or anything close on it do you think just for my dad to check his email
you should try xubuntu, he can run thunderbird or firefox easily on that
it's a lighter window manager, many think it's windows like enough for people who just want the basics
as long as he only opens firefox or thunderbird and openoffice, he should be fine :)
